page.title: 17Credits Shobdon/Byton Survey
page.content: {The pupils of Class 2 all helped {to construct the questionnaire,conduct {the interviews,collect and collate the {information and help type these pages: Christopher Ammonds Rachel Garmory Michael Batson Emma Greening Christina Beard Graham Hobby Tracy Beaumont Richard Lancett Elaine Bowen Robert Leutchford Ann Cantwell Hazel Payne Dominic Cantwell Amanda Stokes Helen Clarke Matthew Teale Sarah Davies Emily Thomas John Elliott Rebecca Wade Timothy Evans Keith Williams Paul Evans Matthew Williams { {The Group Leaders for the Land Survey: Mrs.Ammonds,Mrs.Cantwell,Mrs.Lancett Miss Morgan,Mrs.Payne,Mrs.Stokes, Mrs.Thomas and Mrs.Williams. {Final Editor:}D.A.Barrah.
